topic.fullpath: Topic :: Communications :: Email :: Mailing List Servers
Topic :: Communications :: Email :: Mail Transport Agents

name: Mail-robot
short_description: Mail answering machine. This is Java-based extensible framework. It takes e-mail letters from e-mail mailbox, parses them, processes some business logic depending on the content of the received letter, and sends the result back to the letter sender.
